verses.verse: In the third <WH7969> year <WH8141> of Cyrus <WH3566> king <WH4428> of Persia <WH6539> a thing <WH1697> was revealed <WH1540> unto Daniel, <WH1840> whose <WH834> name <WH8034> was called <WH7121> Belteshazzar; <WH1095> and the thing <WH1697> was true, <WH571> but the time appointed <WH6635> was long: <WH1419> and he understood <WH995> <WH853> the thing, <WH1697> and had understanding <WH998> of the vision. <WH4758>
In those <WH1992> days <WH3117> I <WH589> Daniel <WH1840> was <WH1961> mourning <WH56> three <WH7969> full <WH3117> weeks. <WH7620>

I ate <WH398> no <WH3808> pleasant <WH2530> bread, <WH3899> neither <WH3808> came <WH935> flesh <WH1320> nor wine <WH3196> in <WH413> my mouth, <WH6310> neither <WH3808> did I anoint myself at all, <WH5480> <WH5480> till <WH5704> three <WH7969> whole <WH3117> weeks <WH7620> were fulfilled. <WH4390>

And in the four <WH702> and twentieth <WH6242> day <WH3117> of the first <WH7223> month, <WH2320> as I <WH589> was <WH1961> by <WH5921> the side <WH3027> of the great <WH1419> river, <WH5104> which <WH1931> is Hiddekel; <WH2313>

Then I lifted up <WH5375> <WH853> mine eyes, <WH5869> and looked, <WH7200> and behold <WH2009> a certain <WH259> man <WH376> clothed <WH3847> in linen, <WH906> whose loins <WH4975> were girded <WH2296> with fine gold <WH3800> of Uphaz: <WH210>

His body <WH1472> also was like the beryl, <WH8658> and his face <WH6440> as the appearance <WH4758> of lightning, <WH1300> and his eyes <WH5869> as lamps <WH3940> of fire, <WH784> and his arms <WH2220> and his feet <WH4772> like in color <WH5869> to polished <WH7044> brass, <WH5178> and the voice <WH6963> of his words <WH1697> like the voice <WH6963> of a multitude. <WH1995>

And I <WH589> Daniel <WH1840> alone <WH905> saw <WH7200> <WH853> the vision: <WH4759> for the men <WH376> that <WH834> were <WH1961> with <WH5973> me saw <WH7200> not <WH3808> <WH853> the vision; <WH4759> but <WH61> a great <WH1419> quaking <WH2731> fell <WH5307> upon <WH5921> them, so that they fled <WH1272> to hide themselves. <WH2244>

Therefore I <WH589> was left <WH7604> alone, <WH905> and saw <WH7200> <WH853> this <WH2063> great <WH1419> vision, <WH4759> and there remained <WH7604> no <WH3808> strength <WH3581> in me: for my comeliness <WH1935> was turned <WH2015> in <WH5921> me into corruption, <WH4889> and I retained <WH6113> no <WH3808> strength. <WH3581>

Yet heard <WH8085> I <WH853> the voice <WH6963> of his words: <WH1697> and when I heard <WH8085> <WH853> the voice <WH6963> of his words, <WH1697> then was <WH1961> I <WH589> in a deep sleep <WH7290> on <WH5921> my face, <WH6440> and my face <WH6440> toward the ground. <WH776>
And, behold, <WH2009> a hand <WH3027> touched <WH5060> me, which set <WH5128> me upon <WH5921> my knees <WH1290> and upon the palms <WH3709> of my hands. <WH3027>

And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, O Daniel, <WH1840> a man <WH376> greatly beloved, <WH2530> understand <WH995> the words <WH1697> that <WH834> I <WH595> speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> thee, and stand <WH5975> upright: <WH5921> <WH5977> for <WH3588> unto <WH413> thee am I now <WH6258> sent. <WH7971> And when he had spoken <WH1696> <WH853> this <WH2088> word <WH1697> unto <WH5973> me, I stood <WH5975> trembling. <WH7460>

Then said <WH559> he unto <WH413> me, Fear <WH3372> not, <WH408> Daniel: <WH1840> for <WH3588> from <WH4480> the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> that <WH834> thou didst set <WH5414> <WH853> thine heart <WH3820> to understand, <WH995> and to chasten thyself <WH6031> before <WH6440> thy God, <WH430> thy words <WH1697> were heard, <WH8085> and I <WH589> am come <WH935> for thy words. <WH1697>

But the prince <WH8269> of the kingdom <WH4438> of Persia <WH6539> withstood <WH5975> <WH5048> me one <WH259> and twenty <WH6242> days: <WH3117> but, lo, <WH2009> Michael, <WH4317> one <WH259> of the chief <WH7223> princes, <WH8269> came <WH935> to help <WH5826> me; and I <WH589> remained <WH3498> there <WH8033> with <WH681> the kings <WH4428> of Persia. <WH6539>

Now I am come <WH935> to make thee understand <WH995> <WH853> what <WH834> shall befall <WH7136> thy people <WH5971> in the latter <WH319> days: <WH3117> for <WH3588> yet <WH5750> the vision <WH2377> is for many days. <WH3117>
And when he had spoken <WH1696> such <WH428> words <WH1697> unto <WH5973> me, I set <WH5414> my face <WH6440> toward the ground, <WH776> and I became dumb. <WH481>

And, behold, <WH2009> one like the similitude <WH1823> of the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> touched <WH5060> <WH5921> my lips: <WH8193> then I opened <WH6605> my mouth, <WH6310> and spoke, <WH1696> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> him that stood <WH5975> before <WH5048> me, O my lord, <WH113> by the vision <WH4758> my sorrows <WH6735> are turned <WH2015> upon <WH5921> me, and I have retained <WH6113> no <WH3808> strength. <WH3581>

For how <WH1963> can <WH3201> the servant <WH5650> of this <WH2088> my lord <WH113> talk <WH1696> with <WH5973> this <WH2088> my lord? <WH113> for as for me, <WH589> straightway <WH4480> <WH6258> there remained <WH5975> no <WH3808> strength <WH3581> in me, neither <WH3808> is there breath <WH5397> left <WH7604> in me.
Then there came again <WH3584> and touched <WH5060> me one like the appearance <WH4758> of a man, <WH120> and he strengthened <WH2388> me,

And said, <WH559> O man <WH376> greatly beloved, <WH2530> fear <WH3372> not: <WH408> peace <WH7965> be unto thee, be strong, <WH2388> yea, be strong. <WH2388> And when he had spoken <WH1696> unto <WH5973> me, I was strengthened, <WH2388> and said, <WH559> Let my lord <WH113> speak; <WH1696> for <WH3588> thou hast strengthened <WH2388> me.

Then said <WH559> he, Knowest <WH3045> thou wherefore <WH4100> I come <WH935> unto <WH413> thee? and now <WH6258> will I return <WH7725> to fight <WH3898> with <WH5973> the prince <WH8269> of Persia: <WH6539> and when I <WH589> am gone forth, <WH3318> lo, <WH2009> the prince <WH8269> of Greece <WH3120> shall come. <WH935>

But <WH61> I will show <WH5046> thee <WH853> that which is noted <WH7559> in the Scripture <WH3791> of truth: <WH571> and there is none <WH369> <WH259> that holdeth <WH2388> with <WH5973> me in <WH5921> these things, <WH428> but <WH3588> <WH518> Michael <WH4317> your prince. <WH8269>
